answerText: Junichiro Tanizaki[10] Tanizaki's last published work was this novel, in which Utsugi becomes attracted to his daughter-in-law, Satsuko.
heading: ACF Regionals |2013 | Bellevue + Michigan A + Georgia Tech | 16 | Literature | Other | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: In one of his works, Joji trains his wife to be a Western woman, but she ends up controlling him. For 10 points each: [10] Name this Japanese author of Naomi, who wrote of Kaname's struggles with East versus West in Some Prefer Nettles.
